english.segment1: this is for all the lonely people. thinkin' that life has passed them by. don't give up until you drink from the silver cup. ride that highway in the sky
english.segment2: this is for all the single people. thinkin' that life has left them dry. don't give up until you drink from the silver cup. you never know until you try
english.segment3: and i'm on my way. yes, i'm on my way. well, i'm on my way back home
english.segment4: this is for all the lonely people. thinkin' that life has passed them by. don't give up until you drink from the silver cup. should never take you down or never give you up. you never know until you try
english.segment5: 'cause i'm on my way. yes, i'm on my way. yeah, i'm on my way back home. yes, i'm on my way. yeah, i'm on my way. yes, i'm on my way back home
